title: PLNOTME Womens Baggy Barrel Horseshoe Jeans High Waisted Wide Leg Vintage Denim Pants with Front Pockets
description: Trendy Features: Uniquely curved silhouette. Easy, gently tapered legs. Seam detail at knees. Zip fly and button-front closure. Top-stitched front and back patch pockets.These baggy jeans are made of rigid non-stretch denim, similar to your favorite vintage jeans.
Denim Material: Made from non-stretch denim, these boyfriend barrel horseshoe jeans are durable and long-lasting, ensuring they will be a staple in your wardrobe for years to come.

Versatile Style: The barrel leg design allows for easy pairing with various tops and shoes, making these horseshoe jeans for women suitable for both casual and dressy occasions.This oversized silhouette looks great with a sleek tank.

Suitable for Various Body Types: These barrel leg jeans are suitable for different leg types, including slightly thicker calves, standard legs, O-shaped legs, X-shaped legs, and XO-shaped legs. Follow our care advice to increase the longevity of the clothing.

Size Chart: Please check our size chart before you buy and choose your right size. Of course, if you encounter other things in your purchase, please contact us by email and we will do our best to help you solve your problems.
